translation.en: -[Aurora] Bad news, gang. -[thunderclap]

-[deep voice] Hubie Dubois. -Yes.

…she had a couple glasses of Chardonnay. Her guard was down,

I mean…

[Hubie] Stormhawk in position and petrified. Over.

-Okay? -[Hubie] Copy.

If you feel like you've done all you can, or you feel like you're in danger,

Roger that. Bogey on my twelve.
Three on a match. Smoke 'em if you got 'em.

What's up?
Pumpkin.

Don't kill me.

Hubie.

Hubie, I've been in love with you since the first grade.

Miss Glennon?

I can't believe this.
I can't believe that I spent three years with a self-confident-for-no-reason,

Oh, my God.

Hubie?

Ma! Ma!

translation.en: Father Dave. My childhood friend, Richie Hartman.
translation.ko: 데이브 신부님 내 어릴 적 친구 리치 하트먼

translation.en: -Is that Officer Steve? -[Violet] Yeah.
And the one and only Mr. Walter Lambert.
translation.ko: 그리고 그 유명한 월터 램버트 씨

translation.en: [Hubie] How did you do this?
Terrific costumes, guys. Especially yours, Cooky.
I like it. What are you? A Muppet, right?
Yeah, sure.
-Our kids are so creative. -They are amazing. Mmm!
translation.ko: - 우리 애들 창의력 대장이야 - 진짜 대단해

translation.en: You never kissed me like that, Violet.
I know.
-Yeah, well… -Dad, don't forget your sash.
Okay, yes. Would you put it on me, please? That's right.
Thank you, Danielle and everybody.
I'll see you at the apple-bobbing contest at ten o'clock tonight.
translation.ko: "시장" 이따 밤 10시에 사과 물기 대회장에서 보자

translation.en: Oh, and you two. You guys are gonna be hittin' the parties later,
translation.ko: 그리고 너희 둘은 이따가 파티에 갈 거지?

translation.en: -so I made these for you. -[clicks]
That's some matzo ball soup, also with a flare gun.
You suck!
Sorry about that!
-Thanks, Dad. -Yeah, of course.
And this is chicken gumbo with a hair dryer.
translation.ko: 이건 치킨 검보 수프고 드라이기도 돼

translation.en: [sighs] Wow, that is badass.
All right, guys. Take care. I'll miss you.
translation.ko: 다들 조심들 해라, 보고 싶을 거야

translation.en: -Mr. Mayor Dubois, let's get you downtown. -[car starts]
-Bye! -Love you, Daddy!
Bye! We love you. We'll see you later!
[Hubie] Bye, guys! Bye-bye!
Hey, Hubie!
You're the man!
Thanks. I learned it all from my mother, who's right behind you.
translation.ko: 고맙다, 엄마가 잘 키워주셨어 지금 너희 뒤에 계시네

translation.en: -[all gasp] -Got you, O'Doyle!
-[kids laugh] -Happy Halloween!
Happy Halloween to all! And to all, a good fright!
translation.ko: 모두들 해피 핼러윈! 무시무시한 핼러윈 보내요!

translation.en: [Aurora in high-pitched voice] And so, another Halloween has come to Salem.
So, you best take the advice of our beloved Mayor
and frequent caller, Hubie Dubois. And have a safe and fun time.
translation.ko: 단골 전화 연결 애청자인 휴비 뒤부아의 말대로 안전하고 즐거운 시간 보내세요

translation.en: [Aurora's wife in deep voice] Hang on, baby. Got some spaghetti and meatballs for ya.
[Aurora in deep voice] Okay. Let's Lady and the Tramp that shit.
Murder!
[screaming] What are we screaming at?
Last one. Sorry.
What are you?
[screaming] Who are you?
-What are you? [screaming] -[clattering]
When I was a kid, I used to build a tower with all my candy.
translation.ko: 난 어릴 때 받은 사탕으로 탑을 쌓곤 했어요

translation.en: And all the candy I used before the collapsing of--
Help me!
Now you're all in big, big trouble.
[grunts] Oh, sorry!
That's you in a nutshell, Hubie.
♪ It was a graveyard smash… ♪
Here's some Happy Halloween word searches I printed out.
translation.ko: 해피 핼러윈 단어 찾기를 좀 프린트해 왔거든요

translation.en: That-- that was-- that was-- Ah-- [bleep]
No!
[Rob] That's a good roommate.
[June] Hubie Dubois!
-This is Hubie Dubois. -Hubie, I'm standing right behind you.
translation.ko: - 휴비 뒤부아인데요 - 휴비 난 지금 네 뒤에 있다!

translation.en: Yes!
[man] And… action!
Freeze, Mrs. Dubois!
Hold your fire until my command.
-Shut up! -Shut it!
[Maya] What the hell are you doing?
Did that turn you on?
What is it supposed to be? Little penises?
Smell my feet.
Smell--
Smell--
-Smell my feet. -Really?
Smell my feet.
Yeah. No, it was fun throwing hot dogs at him.
Pubie!
-We gonna eat Peanut tonight. -[horse neighs]
-He was my-- -You be quiet, too. You next.
-Oh, dope. -[all laughing]
[man] And… action!
No! No! No! No!
[Julie] Hubie!
[Adam] Not cool! Not cool! Not cool!
